attributes.action: I support the petition for David Beckham to be included in TeamGB at the London 2012 Olympic games.
attributes.additional_details:
On Thursday 28th June 2012, David Beckham revealed that he was not selected for TeamGB in the London 2012 Olympics, despite being an ambassador for the games and continuing to be a favourite amongst the public.

Instead a player was chosen in front of David Beckham to represent TeamGB who has shown a lack of pride behind his nationality already by declining to participate in the recent Euro 2012 tournament.

I support David Beckham's cause and would like to see him playing and possibly even captaining TeamGB at the Olympics. Beckham is a great player and man, shows respect, supports our team, is honourable, will work wonders on and off the pitch and should be included in Stuart Pearce's squad.
